basics.name: Christian Kamarga
basics.label: Seeking Job Opportunities in Cybersecurity and Data Analytical domains | Master's in Information Systems
basics.summary: Self-driven Cybersecurity postgraduate with 6+ years’ experience in Python and leading teams in Information Technology projects. Proven data analytical and problem-solving skills in interpreting global trends from big data, developed an AI with organizational awareness in security, knowledgeable in threat intelligence and risk management, curious mindset to grow and improve, and excellent communication skills for documentation and presentation.

highlights: Collaborated tasks with team members in weekly Scrum meetings and innovated work processes of securely testing code by recommending best programming practices in compliance with regulations and security policies.
Utilized Streamlit API calls for monitoring and detecting potential risks and threats to organization’s end devices.
Assisted integration of new personnel in remotely setting up client-side Anaconda environments as needed.

work experience.company: University of Texas at Arlington, Arlington, TX
work experience.summary: Department of Information Systems & Operations Management
highlights: Coordinated responsibilities for 2 database classes and improved performance towards fulfilling security procedures.
Created detailed instructions for database installation with troubleshooting steps and mitigated overhead and delays.
Advised 60+ students weekly in compliance with security protocols and policies with experience in Oracle and SQL.
